plugin.title: Viral
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: Viral, a video distribution plugin, supports three main functions: embed, link, and recommendations. It unobtrusively allows the user to share the video they are watching and see recommended videos from the publisher.

flashvar.name: onpause
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify whether or not if the Viral options appear on pause.

flashvar.name: oncomplete
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify whether or not if the Viral options appear when the playback completes.

flashvar.name: allowmenu
flashvar.description: Variable to control the menu button in the control bar.

flashvar.name: functions
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify which of the Viral options to include in the options panel. One or more individual options can be specified in a comma-delimited list.

flashvar.name: recommendations
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify a URL to an XML file with mRSS-formatted recommendations.

flashvar.name: link
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify the URL to be displayed to the user in the link field. This URL should reference the current page being viewed.

flashvar.name: email_subject
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify the text to show in the subject line of the email sent from this plugin - the default is "Check out this video!"

flashvar.name: email_footer
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify the text to show in the footer of the email sent from this plugin - the default is a link to www.longtailvideo.com

flashvar.name: embed
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify the embed code to be displayed to the user in the embed field. This code should reference the current page being viewed. Note: The embed code needs to be escaped and, due to technical limitations, cannot be re-embedded.

flashvar.name: matchplayercolors
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify if the plugin should match the colors used by the regular player. This will override the fgcolor and bgcolor flashvars if set to true.
